title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Beat eggs in a bowl and mix with grated Parmesan.
Drain pasta and mix with bacon, then stir in egg mixture.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste for 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked.
Simmer tomato puree with cream for 10 minutes.
Add chicken to the sauce and cook for 5 more minutes.
